body.name: ATMPC 7 Inch Tablet Android 11 2GB+32GB Mini Tablet with HD IPS Display GMS Dual Camera WiFi Tablet with Case (Black)

features: Wonderful Android 11 Tablet: Our android tablet comes with a high-performance quad-core processor and Android 11 operating system. The good performance processor ensures smooth running of the tablet. The tablet supports WiFi, Bluetooth, and 2GB RAM+32GB ROM (support TF card expansion up to 128GB), which meets your needs to store more TV shows, songs, photos, videos and movies.

Portable Tablet 7 Inch: Our 7in tablet is small and light, which can be easily put in your pocket or small bag to take with to read e-books, check emails, watch shows, play small games or other entertainments while travelling or working.

IPS Display & Long-life Battery: The tablet android equipped with 1024x600 IPS display. The IPS display with 270° vision and bringing better visual experience. Also the small tablet android adopting a built-in re-chargeble 3500mAh large capacity battery, enables standby life of more than 24 hours, audio playback (rest screen state) life of 10 hours, and video playback life of 3 hours.

Well-Designed Protective Case: Our android tablets on sale comes with high quality eligant leather case that not only looks great, but is also drop and dirt resistant! Nylon straps can be used to secure or unsecure the flat cover as needed at any time. Also, the case is foldable and can be used as a stand, freeing up your hands and enjoying with much fun.

Perfect Gifts & Warranty: Our 7 inch android tablet is an ideal present choice for your kids, parents, family or friends. We provide a 1-year warranty for the tablet. The package included: tablet with case * 1, type C cable * 1, instruction book * 1

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ATMPC 7 Inch Tablets with Case Included ATMPC 7 inch android tablet comes with an exquisite leather case, which prevent your tablet from drop, dirt and scratch. Our tablet equipped with high-performance quad-core processor and Android 11 operating system makes tablet use smoother.ATMPC android tablet 7 inch is small and portable, which is easy to carry with while travelling.

Tablet with Leather Case Our tablet come with well-designed leather case. The tablet with case not only turns your tablet into protected state, but can also be used as a tablet stand. Android 11 Tablet Our android tablet runs Android 11 operating system and support Google Play Store to download apps, such as Faceb Book, YouTube, Tik Tok, Gmail etc. Ideal Gift Our tablet is an ideal gift choice for children, friends and family. Perfect as holiday gifts such as Christmas Day, Halloween, etc and birthday gifts.

Portable 7 Inch Tablet Our 7in tablet is small and can be easily put in your pocket or small bag. Perfect size for travelling. High Quality IPS Display Our tablet equipped with a high quality 1024*600 IPS display, which delivers a bright display with richer colors and finer image quality from all angles, so you won't miss any details when watching your favorite movies and shows. Tablet for Entertainment ATMPC 7 inch tablet comes with 32GB ROM, and it supports up to 128GB of external TF card. Storage more ebook, photo, music, small games, video etc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good little tablet
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my 2 year old. He loves it so much. I love that it comes with a case. Speed is fast and quality of the item is great especially for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars An inexpensive tablet, and it shows in the quality.
reviews.reviewText: I picked this tablet up because my iPhone battery was starting to falter, and I use it at church to help control the IP camera. I thought I could use this tablet to take the iPhone's place.Sadly, I fear that even that single usage task would prove too much for this tablet, and I'm not even going to attempt to roll it out on Sunday.Let's put it this way, I had the tablet for 1 hour, and it locked up three times.Three times... while doing nothing more than registering it with Google, configuring it for my WiFi, and setting the local time zone.Should you, for some reason, decide to get this tablet, keep in mind that it defaults to China time zone. It doesn't ask you where you are during set up. It just defaults to China.Speed is acceptable out of the box. Not great, just acceptable. I would expect a new device to be snappy and responsive, but it behaves as if it's been used for the past year and gone to "questionable sites".At this price point and quality level, the only legitimate use I can foresee it filling is that of a disposable toy to give to a young child. The kind of device you don't mind if it gets smashed, hurled across the room, or even lost.I'm truly disappointed with this tablet. It fails in every way I can think of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this tablet and it came with a case and a charger. Perfect for what I was looking for. Easy to use
